name: CreateSurveySubmission
description:
Create a new survey submission.

This tool creates a new survey submission and should be called when you need to record a survey response. Requires appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: survey_submission_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing candidateId, applicationId, surveyFormDefinitionId, and submittedValues. Contains the survey response details.

submittedValues.description:
The values that the candidate submitted in the survey form. 
The keys of this object should be the IDs from the associated survey's form definition, and the values should be the answers to the questions.
The information on what values are expected can be obtained by calling the `surveyFormDefinition.info` endpoint.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
